resources.string: Xenoblade Chronicles 2 is the third entry in the Xenoblade Chronicles series.
Xenoblade Chronicles 3 is the only Xenoblade game to not have its story split into ten distinct chapters.
In Xenoblade Chronicles 3, Noah\'s sword is titled \"The Sword of Origin\".
Xenoblade Chronicles 2: Torna ~ The Golden Country was initially going to be played during chapter seven of the main game, but was instead made a DLC side story.
The original Xenoblade Chronicles, from the Nintendo Wii, was ported to the New Nintendo 3DS.
The future doesn\'t belong to you!\n(Are you sure you want to see the answer?)

Xenoblade Chronicles is a role-playing game originally published by Nintendo in 2010 and developed by Monolith Soft in the previous years. The original Xenoblade Chronicles jumpstarted the series that is now populated with four full games, with more content coming for the most recent release, Xenoblade Chronicles 3.
